00037   include_once("libError.php");
00038 
00039   // Before all, check that MySQL support is installed for PHP
00040   // to avoid the following functions to die silently !
00041   if (!extension_loaded('mysql')){
00042     $message="MySQL support does not seem to be installed on this server";
00043     $hint="Check that the MySQL support for PHP is installed: It is usually ";
00044     $hint.="a package called something like \"php-mysql\" on GNU/Linux distribs.";
00045     $hint.="Do not forget to restart your web server if needed.";
00046     ER_Handler::getInstance()->logCrit("No MySQL support", $message, $hint);
00047     // this is a little dirty and violent, but hopefully won't happen
00048     // too often...
00049     ER_Handler::getInstance()->displayEvents();
00050     die();
00051   }
00052 
00061   function DB_connect($host,$user,$pass){
00062     if ($id=@mysql_connect($host,$user,$pass)) // Assignment !
00063       return $id;
00064     else {
00065       $message="Unable to connect to host \"$host\": ".mysql_error();
00066       $hint="Check that the MySQL host is up, and that you gave the right hostname.";
00067       ER_Handler::getInstance()->logCrit("DB_connect", $message, $hint);
00068       return false;
00069     }
00070   }
00071 
00078   function DB_select($db){
00079     if (@mysql_select_db($db))
00080       return true;
00081     else {
00082       $message="Unable to select database \"$db\": ".mysql_error();
00083       $hint="Check that this database exists, and that you gave the right name.";
00084       ER_Handler::getInstance()->logCrit("DB_select", $message, $hint);
00085       return false;
00086     }
00087   }
00088 
00095   function DB_query($query){
00096     if ($result=@mysql_query($query)) // Assignment !
00097       return $result;
00098     else {
00099       $message="Unable to run query \"$query\": ".mysql_error();
00100       $hint="Check the syntax of this query, and that the requested data exists.";
00101       ER_Handler::getInstance()->logCrit("DB_query", $message, $hint);
00102       return false;
00103     }
00104   }

00119   function DB_dump_result($result, $print=0){
00120     if (! $result)
00121       return false;
00122     if (! $fields_nb=mysql_num_fields($result))
00123       return false;
00124 
00125     $output="<!-- Starting query result dump  -->\n";
00126     $output.="  <table border=\"1\" cellpadding=\"2\" cellspacing=\"0\">\n";
00127     $output.="    <tr>\n";
00128 
00129     for ($i=0; $i<$fields_nb; $i++){
00130       $field_names[$i]=mysql_field_name($result, $i);
00131       $output.="      <th>$field_names[$i]</th>\n";
00132     }
00133 
00134     $output.="  </tr>\n";
00135 
00136     while ($row=mysql_fetch_array($result, MYSQL_ASSOC)){
00137       $output.="    <tr>\n";
00138       foreach($field_names as $this_field){  // foreach($row) does not work here without "MYSQL_ASSOC"
00139         $output.=($row[$this_field])?"      <td>$row[$this_field]</td>\n":"<td>&nbsp;</td>\n";
00140       }
00141       $output.="    </tr>\n";
00142     }
00143 
00144     $output.="  </table>\n";
00145     $output.="<!-- End query result dump -->\n";
00146 
00147     // Finally output the result, with either method, based
00148     // on the coder's choice.
00149     if ($print){
00150       echo $output;
00151     }
00152     return $output;
00153   }
00154 
00174   function DB_dropdown_list($result, $text_field, $id_field, $current_value=""){
00175     $output="<select name=i_$text_field>\n";
00176     while ($row=mysql_fetch_array($result, MYSQL_ASSOC)){
00177       if ($current_value==$row[$id_field])
00178         $selected=" selected";
00179       else
00180         $selected="";
00181        $output.="  <option value=$row[$id_field]".$selected.">".stripslashes($row[$text_field])."</option>\n";
00182     }
00183     $output.="</select>\n";
00184     return $output;
00185   }
00186 
00202   function DB_escape_string($string, $quote=false){
00203     // Stripslashes if slashes already present.
00204     if (get_magic_quotes_gpc()) {
00205       $string = stripslashes($string);
00206     }
00207     // Escape if not integer value.
00208     if (!is_numeric($string)) {
00209       // This one will fail if no connection to the SQL server, so:
00210       if($string=@mysql_real_escape_string($string)){ // Assignment !!!
00211         $string=($quote==true)?"'$string'":$string;
00212       }
00213       else{
00214         $string="'".mysql_escape_string($string)."'";
00215         $message="Unable to real_escape string: ".mysql_error();
00216         $hint="This happens when the MySQL server cannot be reached: Check that it is up !";
00217         ER_Handler::getInstance()->logCrit("DB_escape_string", $message, $hint);
00218       }
00219     }
00220     return $string;
00221   }
